headline: Tapestry’s Q1 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: Tapestry’s first quarter results were characterized by robust growth at its flagship Coach brand and solid international momentum, leading the company to outperform Wall Street’s revenue and profit expectations. Management attributed much of the quarter’s strength to strong Gen Z and Millennial customer acquisition, double-digit growth in leather goods, and the continued success of omnichannel investments.
